Instance.description: A Notebook Entry for Country Items.

Tunable.name: entry_text_description
Tunable.description: The text to display the item's description.

Tunable.name: entry_text_flavor
Tunable.description: The text to display the flavor text for the item.

Tunable.name: entry_text_value
Tunable.description: The text used to display the item's value. First (only) token is price of object.
